title: Do presidential warnings give the government full access to your phone?
subtitle: A software engineer and a cipherist (John McPhee) claimed that the presidential alarm system gave the government access to your phone. We didn't find any evidence to support this claim.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: "Presidential alerts" are able to access the E911 chip in your phones, which allows the Government to have full access to your location, microphone, camera and each of your phone functions.
